title: Font ID: Sundance Logo
content:
Hello All:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20121103232249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sundance_4702.png)

This looks similar to Perpetua but the lowercase “a” is throwing me off.

Thanks guys,

Mikey :-)
author: SuperUltraFabulous

comments.content: Sad. They had a custom mark developed for them several years ago and now it looks generic.

I think this is [Golden Cockerel](http://web.archive.org/web/20121103232249/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/SerifGuide/serifsamples/serif_fg/golden_cockerel_full.gif). (sample from Serif Font ID Guide)

- Mike Yanega

Yes! Golden Cockerel modified.

Thank you all for your comments.

Mike Diaz :-)
I never noticed how the s was leaning back until just now.
